title: hello i reset my pixel xl and i am having issues with frp lock, its stuck in a loop
content:
hello 
i reset my pixel xl which i bought brand new only a few months ago 
it takes me to the enter a google account that was previously synced on this device, when i do it then says something went wrong and takes me straight back to entering a google account 
i have tried all my google accounts and all sorts of frp bypass solutions and nothing has worked
if someone can help me with this i would be very grateful
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel
